content:
I'm getting this as an error: for CRD: Task/questionnaire-example: Task.text.div error The URL http://example.org/Questionnaire/XYZ|2 is not valid (URL contains Invalid Characters ([|]))

Obviously it's trying to turn the canonical into a hyperlink and isn't accounting for the fact that there's a version specified. (Presumably we shouldn't try to hyperlink to a version-specific canonical, as the base URL might not be the specified version.) In this particular case, the canonical is one of the Task.inputs.
